description: Understand your review collection performance with comprehensive analytics, metrics tracking, and actionable insights in Prompt Reviews.

key_features.title: Review Performance Tracking
key_features.description: Monitor review volume trends, platform distribution, and conversion rates across all your prompt pages with comprehensive visual charts.

key_features.title: Sentiment Analysis
key_features.description: Track customer satisfaction through emoji feedback and sentiment trends. Identify patterns in positive and negative responses over time.

key_features.title: Engagement Metrics
key_features.description: Analyze prompt page performance with detailed metrics on views, clicks, and conversion rates to optimize your review collection strategy.

key_features.title: Advanced Filtering
key_features.description: Segment data by time periods, locations, prompt pages, and review platforms to get granular insights into your performance.

how_it_works.title: Data Collection
how_it_works.description: Analytics automatically track all customer interactions with your prompt pages, review submissions, and sentiment feedback in real-time.

how_it_works.title: Visual Insights
how_it_works.description: View comprehensive dashboards with charts, graphs, and metrics that make it easy to understand your review collection performance at a glance.

how_it_works.title: Actionable Optimization
how_it_works.description: Use data insights to identify top-performing content, optimize underperforming pages, and make informed decisions to improve your review strategy.

best_practices.title: Regular Monitoring
best_practices.description: Check analytics weekly to identify trends early and adjust your review collection strategy based on performance data.

best_practices.title: Use Time Comparisons
best_practices.description: Compare month-over-month and year-over-year performance to understand seasonal patterns and long-term growth trends.

best_practices.title: Focus on Conversion Rates
best_practices.description: Track not just page views but actual review submissions to optimize the pages that drive the most valuable outcomes.

best_practices.title: Share Insights with Team
best_practices.description: Keep team members informed about performance metrics and use data to guide collaborative improvement efforts.
